response.original_title: 実録!!ほんとにあった恐怖の投稿映像 39
response.overview: A long-selling work that has become an immovable title as a psychic video posted based on real records. This time as well, in "Abandoned Crematorium of Horror", it is said that there is a terrifying ruin that is said to cause spiritual disturbances just by passing through the vicinity, but it is said that it was originally a crematorium. There are various facilities on the premises that can be fully understood as being originally a crematorium, but the things left behind are not only the facilities, but the spirits of the dead may also remain on the spot. .
response.tagline: The 39th release of the classic horror movie collection!!
response.title: Actual Record! Real Horror Posted Video 39
